feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Master Data Governance
feed.subtitle: SAP Master Data Governance Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Correct approach to get the staging and active data in rule context BADI?
entry.content:
Dear All

I have a Jira - to set modified flag on the plant status(MSTAE, MMSTA) for the material(change CR) in the rule context BADI.

Below are the steps followed

- Created a change flag in the single value decision table(with condition alias), for this condition alias maintained data in user agent decision table

- Created service name 

- Implemented rule context BADI with filter as earlier created service name

- Only in material change CR(not create CR), for the plant status modification changes, I have to check the staging and active values and set modified flag.

 Getting the staging data using API and active data using tables MARA and MARC.

staging data

model_ref->read_char_value(
i_readmode = if_usmd_model_ext=>gc_readmode_default

 

May i know if this the right approach ?

Or getting the active data also using 

model_ref->read_char_value(
i_readmode = if_usmd_db_adapter=>gc_readmode_no_inact

 

Please provide your suggestions.

 

regards

Chandra.

entry.title: SAP MDG FI: Node XXX is not located within the hierarchy
entry.content:
Hi SCN Community,

I hope you are all doing well.

While performing operations on SAP MDG Finance Data Loads (Cost and Profit Center Hierarchy), I encountered an error during File Upload ‚Äì Step 04 (Check & Execute):

"Node XXX is not located within hierarchy."

Interestingly, this cost hierarchy already exists in the system for the given edition, but it is not visible under Display Master Data: Cost Center Group hierarchy.

Here‚Äôs what I have already checked:

  • In Steps 1 to 3 of File Upload, all parameters were evaluated and assigned correctly.
  • The variant settings appear fine.
  • The hierarchy structure in the system matches the Excel file.

I‚Äôm unsure what might be causing this issue. Could anyone please guide me on:

  • What parameters I should re-check or adjust?
  • Possible reasons why the hierarchy is not being recognized at Step 04?
  • Any best practices or troubleshooting steps for this scenario?

Your insights or experiences would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

Best Regards, 
Sandeep Suggu.

entry.title: Replication steps for BP_CUSGEN entity custom fields in MDG codeployment
entry.content:
Hi All,

In MDG Codeployment  replication scenario.

I have added 2 custom fields in data model BP---->BP_CUSGEN entity. Added two custom fields on Customer UI screen(Control data ).

Now I need to replicate the data entered in 2 custom fields on UI screen  to the backend ECC system. 

Appreciate your  inputs

entry.title: Deletion of Basic data text in Material is not replicating from S4 to ECC
entry.content:
Hi Team,

We have observed that when the basic data text (STXH) exists for a material, the data replicates correctly from S/4 to ECC, and the MATMAS message includes the segment E1MTXHM as expected. However, when we delete the basic data text for the material, the change is not replicated properly to ECC. In this case, the E1MTXHM segment is missing from the MATMAS message, whereas we would expect it to be present with the '003' MSGFN (function code for deletion).

It appears that the standard process deletes the segment entirely, instead of sending an update with MSGFN '003'. Could someone advise on how to ensure that the E1MTXHM segment is included in the MATMAS message to ECC with MSGFN '003' when the basic data text is deleted?
Can someone guide me which badi need to use?
I tried in IDOC_DATA_INSERT but still no luck . 
It would be great if someone can provide a sample code.

Thank you.

entry.title: Field "Standard Method" COMM_TYPE is grayed out for change scenario
entry.content:
Hello,

I have pulled the field "Standard Method" on the address UIBB under the "Standard Communication" Section. This field appears grayed out for change scenario but appears editable for create scenario both are custom CR.

The config(Field Properties) for the custom CR for change scenario is set as "Standard"

This field is independent of any other field , also there is no code to disable this field in field property badi, what is causing the field to be grayed out? how can I enable it for change scenario? what all should I check in the system?

Regards,

Ankit

entry.title: API or function to Reject CR of BP in MDG
entry.content:
Dear Experts, We have a need to create a interface to approve or reject CR of BP in MDG, which using role base workflow. We are tring the method cl_usmd_wf_service->COMPLETE_CREQUEST_WFSTEP to reject CR like this: 

        But after it executed successfully , the CR status is still "To Be Considered and Approved" :

       And the workflow item log is complete but no reject action:

        So we don't know whether this method is the right way to reject CR. What we want is after we reject the CR, the status should be: "To Revise: Perform Changes"

And the workflow log should be like this:

       Is anyone come across this problem ever ,please help us with this, thank you so much!

B.R

Kevin

entry.title: UI element - dropdown attribute modification in Fiori
entry.content:
Hi, I am working on an UI element modification, a dropdown element which has multiple attributes under the list and requirement is to remove some of the selected from the list.
This UI element is under Search criteria UIBB block of Manage Material(Material Data Management).
For example, the dropdown list contain attributes like (Old Material number, Basic number, Middle Group, Description ID,....) and some of this attributes has to be removed from the list.
Is there any Class-method where I can restrict the attributes or any modification can be done from UI level?

entry.title: Delivery Class for T012
entry.content:
Hi,

We use Customizing synchronization to keep ERP and MDG synchronized. With table T012, we constantly receive a message in MDG that it is on the wrong request type. While a Customizing request is used in ERP, MDG requires a workbench request.

 

A comparison of the delivery classes for table T012 shows that class ‚ÄúC‚Äù (customizing table) is used in ERP and class ‚ÄúA‚Äù (application table) is used in MDG.

Is this a bug or a feature? üòÅ

Is there an SAP note on this?

MDG:

 

ERP:

entry.title: Custom attribute is not showing at Change request step level in configure properties of CR step.
entry.content:
Hello team,
In SAP MDG, I extended the data model by introducing custom attributes to the MARCBASIC entity type. While the attributes are correctly defined in the data model (checked via the Data Model Repository), they are not displayed during processing at Change Request Step 00 for the relevant Change Request type in configuration of change request step in MDGIMG config.

entry.title: How to add F4 value to Custom Field in MM01 Tcode
entry.content:
Hi Team,
I have created a custom tab with some custom fields at the material master (S4 level) in transaction MM01. These fields have been appended at the MARA table level using Custom Fields & Logic (CFL) fiori app, which currently prevents me from adding a search help directly at the database level with message ( You cannot edit object R3TR TABL ** with the standard editor) .We also do not require the use of a CDS view for this enhancement.
Is there an alternative way to enable search help for these custom fields, or could someone advise if there is a user exit or another place where we could implement custom logic for this purpose?
Any guidance or suggestions would be greatly appreciated.

entry.title: MDG Mass creation of Key Mappings in the S4 HANA System
entry.content:
Hi Every One,

Our requirement is to insert Key Mappings for MDG BP.

I found a Program CREATE_MASS_KEY_MAPPING, but its deprecated in S4 System. 

Another way is the Transaction MDG_KM_MAINTAIN, but this i can not use for Mas creation.

Please let us know if any standard Program to create Key Mapping for MDG BP. After creation where we can check these key Mappings.

Thanks & Regards,

Prasad.

entry.title: MDG-M Get others Node Data from a different Node
entry.content:
Hi, Experts.

I added a custom field within the Basic Data section in the Manage Material - governance app (entity MATERIAL node MARA). I also created a feeder class (subclass of CL_MDG_BS_MAT_FEEDER_FORM) to personalize the search help of this new field.

All ok so far. The problem is that I need to get the data from a different node (MAKT) to know what information should be shown in the search help. I do not know how to get the data from a node (MAKT) different than the node (MARA) of my new field. I tried instantiating class /PLMU/CL_FRW_CONTEXT_POOL, but the attribute that contains the information (MT_CONTEXT_POOL) is private and I cannot read it from the feeder class. üòû 

I'm trying to do this in the method /PLMU/IF_FRW_G_OVS~HANDLE_PHASE_2.

Any advice? thanks in advance.

entry.title: MDG-M Get data of a node from other node. Manage Material - Governance App
entry.content:
Hi Experts.

I'm dealing with getting the data of node MAKT and entity MATERIAL from the feeder class associated to a search help of a new field that belongs to a different node (MARA). My feeder class is a subclass of CL_MDG_BS_MAT_FEEDER_FORM.

Within method /PLMU/IF_FRW_G_OVS~HANDLE_PHASE_2, I tried to instantiate class /PLMU/CL_FRW_CONTEXT_POOL and get the MAKT context from the attribute MT_CONTEXT_POOL, however, this is private and I cannot read it from my code.

Any advice? Thanks in advance.

entry.title: How do you know the vendor number in MDG and its corresponding vendor number in S4HANA?
entry.content:
Hi MDG Experts,

May I know how do you check the mapping of a vendor in SAP MDG (source) versus its vendor code in SAP S4HANA (target)? Is there a configuration or SAP standard table that is being maintained?

If yes, please provide the path in IMG or the SAP standard table?

Thanks,

Newguycloud

entry.title: MDG Consolidation process to trigger from Mulesoft
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Can you advise me of the steps as to how I can trigger a Consolidation process from a message coming from Mulesoft(Salesforce)? We have a requirement where we need to trigger Consolidation likewise.

Any help explaining all the detailed steps would be much appreciated.

Thanks, T

entry.title: Differentiating QM processes for in-house vs. external procurement under Procurement Type ‚ÄúX‚Äù
entry.content:
Hello SAP experts,

We are working on an SAP project for a client who wants to use Procurement Type ‚ÄúX‚Äù (both in-house and external procurement) for certain semi-finished and assembly materials.

From the QM side, the client wants to ensure clear differentiation of quality management processes depending on whether the material is produced internally or procured externally.

We are currently analyzing how this can be configured and controlled within SAP ERP.
Some of the main questions we have are:

  1. QM differentiation:

    • How can QM responsibilities, inspection lots, and first article inspections (FAI) be managed separately for in-house vs. externally sourced lots when Procurement Type = ‚ÄúX‚Äù?

    • Are there standard configuration options (e.g., inspection types, source-specific QM data, site-specific fields, or custom enhancements) that allow this distinction?

  2. Governance and master data:

    • If Procurement Type ‚ÄúX‚Äù is used, what governance mechanisms or procedures do you apply to ensure that QM and SCM responsibilities are clearly separated and audit-compliant?

    • Are there cases where separate material numbers are still recommended for QM control reasons?

Any real-world examples, best-practice setups, or configuration hints from projects where Procurement Type ‚ÄúX‚Äù was implemented successfully would be extremely valuable for our analysis.

Thank you very much in advance for your insights!

Best regards,

entry.title: UI Configuration of screen behavior in 'Create new' screen in FIORI
entry.content:
Hi experts,
I am working on a modification of a screen in FIORI which is actually to change the behavior to work same as any CR Types - "Create new material"(Material Data Management).
Coming to the point, for a standard CR types - create new screen then filling mandatory field and then directly if we click on 'cancel button' it gives a pop up waring-> OK and then navigates to another screen(non-editable screen), further we get 'continue' button. And when it is clicked it takes back to "Create new screen again".
But incase some of our ZM CR types(Manage Front number, Manage Middle group, Mange description catalogue ) it works same till cancel button but after clicking on cancel button it navigates to a different screen(editable screen) without a "Continue button".
I am trying to know how can we change the screen behavior so that it will work same as like in "Create new material" standard process, or where can I check to compare this difference and replicate the same in our ZM CR-types scenario.
I have attached two screenshots to compare both above mentioned scenarios.
Best Regards,
Sagar

entry.title: SAP MDG Upgrade: After upgrade standard UIBB ERP vendor not visible
entry.content:
Hi experts,

We have upgraded our mdg system fps 1909 to 2023. after upgrade the standard UIBBs like ERP vendor and ERP customer are not visible while maintaining the data using CR in fiori. we did not enhance these UIBBs with any custom fields. We have two custom handler classes but they are related to different UIBBs not related to ERP vendor or customer.

please let me know the root cause of this problem.

Thanks, Srikanth

entry.title: MDG 2023 Upgrade Business Function Activation
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

We have upgraded MDG from 2021 to 2023 and after upgrade we completed SPDD and later when we started to adjust SPAU objects we have identified the Business Functions was not activated to the latest version of 2023.

Now can we complete the SPAU objects without activating the Business Functions and later can we activate.

Will there be any impact.

Regards,

SP

entry.title: how can i read the MLANSALES entity data in derivation class?
entry.content:
Dear Colleagues

I worked on deriving default sales orgs for a POOL material .

Sales org derived(Distribution Chains) and also the relevant tax classification(Standard) in Distribution Chain: Tax .

I also want to default the tax classification but  i am not able to read the tax classification data.

Entity is MLANSALES , it is not having any attributes but having relationships.

So, how could i read the MLANSALES entity?

 

regards

Chandra.
